ygData.subject: RE: Fanged Skull Stiletto
ygData.msgSnippet: i heard it was GM event only, probably how he got it.  seems unlikely it is still NOT lore though.  every other wep from there is.  or maybe it is primary hand
ygData.messageBody:
i heard it was GM event only, probably how he got it. seems unlikely it is
still NOT lore though. every other wep from there is. or maybe it is
primary hand only. i finally get a damn six note blade, and now something
better. will it ever end?!?!

Shada

>
> From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>
> LOL
>
> Shada let's loose a great bellow!
>

> server has it,
> and they are tightlipped about how they got it (I think it
> was a quest at
> the time).
